name: Howl
description:
This work is inspired by the famous poem - Howl, by Allen Ginsberg, which is an outcry of rage and despair against a broken and destructive society. I’ve been thinking about this piece as a visualization of the ‘stream of consciousness’ style of prose created by writers like Ginsberg and Kerouac. This is an experimental work that combines more representational painting with my organic abstraction. 

Digital Painting | 3000 x 5000
